llama2.description: Llama 2 is released by Meta Platforms, Inc. This model is trained on 2 trillion tokens, and by default supports a context length of 4096. Llama 2 Chat models are fine-tuned on over 1 million human annotations, and are made for chat.

gemma.description: Llama 2 is released by Meta Platforms, Inc. This model is trained on 2 trillion tokens, and by default supports a context length of 4096. Llama 2 Chat models are fine-tuned on over 1 million human annotations, and are made for chat.
